name: Burger Kid's Journey
description:
Who said that the bad guys don't have their stories ?! In Burger Kid's Journey™, discover a familiar story from an other view ...

__________________

This game is a sort of "additional game" for DONNY DONUT 2™ : CIRCLE OF SEASONS. You may be spoiled by playing that game. You can get it for free !
